Class VirtualView

java.lang.Object
server.VirtualView
public class VirtualView
extends java.lang.Object
The virtual view of the server

    • setUpGame

      public void setUpGame​(java.lang.String temporaryNickname, java.lang.String nickname, java.util.Date birthDate, int numPlayers)
      Send to the controller the information of the player
      Parameters:
      temporaryNickname - The temporary nickname of the player
      nickname - The requested nickname
      birthDate - The birth date of the player
      numPlayers - The number of the players of the game (ignored if the player isn't the first one)

      nickname - The requested nickname

      genre - The genre of the worker
      position - The position of the worker

      Parameters:
      nickname - The nickname of the disconnected user

    • checkGameStatus

      public boolean checkGameStatus()
      Checks if the game is still active
      Returns:
      True if the game is still active, otherwise false
